\n<???>Howdy, y'all!\.\. I'm Sunny!\. Sunny the Sunflower!
\n<Will>I made you!\. I drew you with my own hands!
\n<Sunny>And I must thank you for that,\. pard'ner.
\n<Sunny>And this town ain't big enough for the two of us.
\n<Will>I don't want to fight you, Sunny...
\n<Sunny>Heh, heh...\. maybe this will change your mind.
\n<Sunny>Unless we find out who's really better,\. feller.
\n<Sunny>Fight me and win,\. and I'll let go of your pals here.
\n<Will>Everything's not okay.\. I don't want to
\n<Will>But if that's what it takes to save my
friends,\. then dammit,\. I'll do it!
\n<Sunny>There ya go!\. Show me what you got!
\n<Sunny>Well, it looks like ya bested me, pard'ner.
\n<Adrian>Yeah,\. that experience wasn't good.\.\. Thanks for freeing
\n<Adrianna>Uhh, can we come with you?\. We were looking
Adrianna and Adrian joined the party.
\n<Sunny>Well, it looks like ya bested me, pard'ner.
\n<Adrian>Yeah,\. that experience wasn't good.\.\. Thanks for freeing
\n<Adrianna>Uhh, can we come with you?\. We were looking
Adrianna and Adrian joined the party.
\n<Will>I know that not everything's okay,\. and you
\n<Will>The town is in ruins,\. and I think I could
\n<Will>Thanks guys,\. this was really fun.\.\. Feel
